quote: My first buyer client came from the first open house I held.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the effectiveness of open houses in lead generation.
suggested_hook: Looking for your first real estate client? Here's how open houses can be your secret weapon.

quote: I never post just listed or just sold. I focus on client stories and adding value.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional approach to social media marketing in real estate.
suggested_hook: Why you should stop posting 'just sold' on social media.
